1.16.5.1.0.1:
Fixed Ticking block entity on Bound Soul crash.
Fixed missing Loot Table error (for test.json).
1.16.5.1.5.0:
Added mist - Gravestones, Bound Souls, and Wither Tree's poison and wither mist.
Added Key Ring.
Added key merging ability.
Added treasure maps to other Treasure chests.
Updated bounding boxes of gravestones.
Fixed Well and Wither Tree regitries.
Attempt to fix LockItem.appendHoverText initialization crash with some performance mods.
Uses Forge-36.2.0
1.16.5.1.6.0:
Added Charms (except Harvesting).
Added Pouch Item.(standard only, Lucks, Apprentice and Master will not be added).
Uses GottschCore 1.4.0 which fixes crash bug on mob spawn by ProximitySpawner.
Prevent crashes when coins thrown in wells has an exception.
1.16.5.1.6.1: Fixed Curios required crash (it is optional).
1.16.5.1.7.0:
Added Adornments.
Changed ReflectionCharm from LivingDamageEvent to LivingHurtEvent, so that the full amount of damage is reflected back at the mob.
Update loot tables.
